Module guigame

Defines the Pong-game's logic and GUI. Use StartGame.main-method to run the game.

They may partly be used from outside of the project but most classes are specificly done for a work only util inside the game.

See Also:
StartGame

  • Packages

    Exports
    Package Description
    guigame.gui.borders
    Border utilities for easier border-creation.
    guigame.gui.main
    Contains all major classes for the GUI.
    guigame.gui.menu
    Contains the GUI-menus.
    guigame.gui.menu.submenus
    Contains GUI-submenus.
    guigame.gui.objects
    Contains GameObjects for the GUI.
    guigame.gui.panes
    Contains implementations of specific JComponents with the game's color scheme and custom logic.
    guigame.gui.panes.buttons
    Contains BaseButton and some specific implementations.
    guigame.logic
    Logic-part for the whole game.
    guigame.logic.event
    Contains custom Events and EventListeners.
    guigame.logic.event.askers
    Contains askers (windows that block the parent window and ask the user something.
    guigame.logic.exceptions
    Contains custom exceptions.
    guigame.logic.main
    Contains the main parts for the game.
    guigame.logic.menu
    Contains all logic-parts for the GUIMenus.
    guigame.logic.objects
    Contains the logic part of GameObjects.
    guigame.logic.players
    Contains player utilities and Players.
